publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3928 Linda Fabiani: East Kilbride’s Cutting Edge—That the Parliament congratulates archaeologists from the National Trust for Scotland and radiocarbon dating specialists at the Scottish Universities Environmental Research Centre (SUERC) in East Kilbride who have uncovered a prehistoric midden on the island of Iona and confirmed that it dates from between 930 and 810 BC, during the Bronze Age; believes that such significant finds are crucial to our understanding of the historical development of the Scots people and nation; welcomes the SUERC radiocarbon laboratory’s use of modern scientific methods to illuminate Scotland’s ancient past, and agrees that this latest milestone confirms East Kilbride’s position at the cutting edge of Scotland’s achievements in science.
S3M-3928 East Kilbride’s Cutting Edge (lodged on 20 April 2009) Jamie Hepburn*

S3M-3928 East Kilbride’s Cutting Edge (lodged on 20 April 2009) Bill Kidd*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Patricia Ferguson*, Michael Matheson*, Alasdair Allan*, Kenneth Gibson*, Bill Wilson*, Stewart Maxwell*, Rob Gibson*, John Wilson*, Gil Paterson*, Christina McKelvie*, Sandra White*, Brian Adam*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*

S3M-3928 Linda Fabiani: East Kilbride’s Cutting Edge—That the Parliament congratulates archaeologists from the National Trust for Scotland and radiocarbon dating specialists at the Scottish Universities Environmental Research Centre (SUERC) in East Kilbride who have uncovered a prehistoric midden on the island of Iona and confirmed that it dates from between 930 and 810 BC, during the Bronze Age; believes that such significant finds are crucial to our understanding of the historical development of the Scots people and nation; welcomes the SUERC radiocarbon laboratory’s use of modern scientific methods to illuminate Scotland’s ancient past, and agrees that this latest milestone confirms East Kilbride’s position at the cutting edge of Scotland’s achievements in science. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Bill Kidd, Hugh O’Donnell, Patricia Ferguson, Michael Matheson, Alasdair Allan, Kenneth Gibson, Bill Wilson, Stewart Maxwell, Rob Gibson, John Wilson, Gil Paterson, Christina McKelvie, Sandra White, Brian Adam, Shirley-Anne Somerville, Robin Harper*, Aileen Campbell*, Maureen Watt*, Margaret Mitchell*
S3M-3928 East Kilbride’s Cutting Edge (lodged on 20 April 2009) Bob Doris*, Stuart McMillan*
